alert.note: Alert for Catahoula (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Catahoula Parish through 330 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sherwood, or 18 miles southeast of Columbia, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Aimwell around 300 PM CDT. Manifest around 315 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Harrisonburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
